localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Explore 100+ ready-to-use Smart Skills with deep domain intelligence, crafted by Conversation Designers to help you build high-quality Intelligent Virtual Assistants for your business.
nodes.title: Haptik - Smart Skills - Enterprise ready smart skills for high frequency use cases
nodes.author: Nandini Gounder

nodes.excerpt: Sleegal is an online marketplace that uses machine learning to match users with lawyers. We built this website free for all to use because we believe high-quality professional service should be made accessible to everyone, not just the elite.
nodes.title: Sleegal - Find the right lawyers instantly - free for all to use
nodes.author: Gloria Qiao

nodes.excerpt: isowords is an all new word search game for your phone. You can play solo, multiplayer, or compete in the daily challenge.
nodes.title: isowords - Word search on a vanishing cube
nodes.author: Zack Sears

nodes.title:
A year ago the $VIX closed at a record high: 82.69.

Today it moved down to 19.23, its lowest level since the pandemic began and back below its historical average (19.50).

Charting via @ycharts https://t.co/NwUFslKC3K
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.excerpt: Hue Sentiment is an easy to use Philips Hue light app which translates text into a mood. Simply type how you're feeling and notice the lights change based on your mood.
nodes.title: Hue Sentiment - Control lights with your mood
nodes.author: rihab

nodes.excerpt: Terapify is a video chat platform that connects people who need psychological help with vetted psychotherapists who share their culture and language in an easy, secure and affordable way.
nodes.title: Terapify - Online therapy platform for Spanish-speaking people
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: TextGen is a new service that allows you to train your own text generation ML models and then use them to generate text through a simple API with no AI knowledge required and at low price. You send us your text dataset, we train the model and serve it for you.
nodes.title: TextGen - Train and serve your ML text generation model using an API
nodes.author: Pablo Marino

nodes.excerpt: Booked solid every day and barely have time to get a coffee or even run to the restroom? Meet BreakBot. A free Google Calendar add-on that automatically adds breaks to your day when it knows you need one! Because that meeting could have been an email a break.
nodes.title: BreakBot - Auto add breaks to your calendar before you get overbooked
nodes.author: Jonathan Ronzio

nodes.title:
"IRS Said to Delay Tax-Filing Deadline Until Mid-May"

Why do we even need taxes anymore when we can just borrow the money and have the Fed buy that debt?
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.title:
Powell presser:
-Economy will boom & markets look great but...
-We're not gonna raise rates for years &
-We're gonna keep buying assets until well after it is needed b/c...
-There's no negative consequences whatsoever to any of our actions ever.
-And all inflation is transitory.
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.title:
The Fed:

here's the same stuff we've been telling you for months

The stock market:

I'm going to rally again on these comments just to be safe

nodes.title: Prefix - Build custom computer automations anywhere

nodes.excerpt: Zealous lets any creator: - Create a home page for all their live activity - Build a mailing list of their true fans - Engage in realtime with fans via live rooms - Monetize through tips, tickets, and subscriptions Join our live Q&A! https://community.zealous.space/r/4ckvmy http://bit.ly/zealous-qa
nodes.title: Zealous - VIP live streams for your true fans

nodes.excerpt: Zoho Mail Bookmarks is integrated with your Zoho Inbox and can be accessed from anywhere. With this plugin, you can easily save any URL/ link to your Zoho Mail Bookmarks for your personal reference or to share with your team.
nodes.title: Zoho Mail Bookmarks - Save any URL link from your browser
nodes.author: Ravi Sethia

nodes.title:
60/40 portfolios by demographic:

Boomers: 60% S&P 500 / 40% Agg

Gen X: 60% cash / 40% sulking about how no one pays attention to their generation

Millennials: 60% bitcoin / 40% TSLA

Gen Z 60% NFTs / 40% trading live-streamed call options on some penny stock
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

2021 YTD: $85 billion
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.excerpt: It's often difficult for most people to share their thoughts and over time it builds up in them, to let people have these thoughts free and release their burden we build this app. Here everyone can write freely without being getting judged by others.
nodes.title: Articled - Write where your words matter | Read & write short stories.
nodes.author: Sajal Rai

nodes.excerpt: AI Conversation Flow is a powerful virtual email conversation builder to help marketing teams convert neglected leads into sales-ready hand-raisers.
nodes.title: Saleswhale Email AI Conversation Flow - A new way to build intent-based lead conversion campaigns
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Built from the ground up for performance. A powerful AI engine for generating copy to drive conversions. Generate or improve your own ideas for ads, social posts, email subject lines and landing pages.
nodes.title: Anyword - Write your copy with an AI trained on $250M of ads
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Google Analytics meets intelligent algorithms: find hidden conversion opportunities in your Google Analytics data. A tool that analyzes your data and shows exactly how to improve your conversion rates. Offers audits and 24/7 monitoring of Google Analytics.
nodes.title: Convertmind - Google analytics monitoring & audits to increase conversions
nodes.author: Gijs Wierda

nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.excerpt: Stop interrupting with @channel! Usually anyone can answer so why do we keep distracting everyone? Tellspin makes it easy to create schedules / escalation policies for Slack. Share the load with your team members with built-in user groups/@mentions.
nodes.title: Tellspin - Automatic user group / @mention rotation in Slack
nodes.author: Dan Willoughby
